description: The main source file for a Flutter-based finance tracking app, defining the app's entry point, navigation, authentication flow, and core screens such as Dashboard, Transactions, Budgets, and Charts. It includes UI components, theme setup, and interactions with various services.

classes.name: AppGradients
classes.description: Contains static LinearGradient definitions for consistent gradient styles throughout the app.

classes.name: FinanceTrackerApp
classes.description: The root widget initializing MaterialApp with theme configurations and setting the home to AuthNavigation.

classes.name: AuthNavigation
classes.description: Manages authentication state and routing between login, registration, and main application screens.

classes.name: MainScaffold
classes.description: Main app shell with bottom navigation, handling navigation between core sections and logout functionality.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: Provides login UI, handles login logic, and navigates to the main app on success.

classes.name: RegisterScreen
classes.description: Provides registration UI, handles registration logic, and switches to login upon success.

classes.name: DashboardScreen
classes.description: Displays recent transactions and a quick summary, allowing navigation to add transactions.

classes.name: TransactionsScreen
classes.description: Displays a list of transactions with options to add, edit, or delete entries.

classes.name: TransactionEditScreen
classes.description: Form to add or edit transactions, with validation and backend interaction.

classes.name: BudgetsScreen
classes.description: Shows budget categories, limits, and spent amounts, with refresh capability.

classes.name: ChartsScreen
classes.description: Displays analytical charts and breakdowns of spending by category.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for each screen or component, setting up themes, layout, and UI widgets.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state; used in various StatefulWidgets to load data or set up variables.

methods.name: _handleLogin
methods.description: Handles the login process by calling AuthService and navigating on success.

methods.name: _handleRegister
methods.description: Handles user registration via AuthService and switches views upon success.

methods.name: _fetchRecent
methods.description: Fetches recent transaction data for Dashboard or refreshes transaction list.

methods.name: _fetchTransactions
methods.description: Retrieves the list of transactions for display and updates the interface.

methods.name: _deleteTx
methods.description: Confirms and deletes a transaction based on user input, then refreshes list.

methods.name: _save
methods.description: Validates and submits transaction data to backend, handling responses and errors.

methods.name: _pickDate
methods.description: Opens date picker dialog for transaction date selection.
